word_mean: 石灰质的，钙质的：〔含有〕石灰的，〔含〕钙的

sentence.Network_en: Plants from the high - lime plots grew better on calcareous soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 高石灰小区的植株在石灰质土上生成较好.

sentence.Network_en: Other plankton species in near equal numbers replaced calcareous microplankton as they died out.
sentence.Network_cn: 钙质微体浮游生物消亡时,已经有近乎等量的其它浮游生物种类代替它们了.

sentence.Network_en: Calcite cementation seens a possibility where lime grains or calcareous organisms are abundant.
sentence.Network_cn: 在灰质颗粒或钙质生物丰富的地方,方解石胶结作用似乎是有可能的.

list.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(CD) ... calcareous spar 方解石 calcareous tufa 石灰华 calcareous 石灰质的.
【摘要】:我国北方地区分布着大面积的石灰性土壤(Calcareous Soil),而且大部分是重要的农田土壤。由于土壤剖面中含有不同数量的碳酸钙或碳酸氢钙等石灰性物质,一方面.
建筑专业英语词汇(C)_百度文库 ... calcareous cement 含钙水泥 calcareous clay 石灰质粘土 calcareous earth 石灰质土.
3. 石灰质土calcareous spar 方解石calcareous ooze 钙质软泥

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin calcarius (from calx, calc- 'lime') + -eous

means.word_mean: 1. composed of or containing or resembling calcium carbonate or calcite or chalk
